page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: {(HOME LIFE CONTINUED)}As part of the survey pupils were asked questions about themselves. We found out that forty nine pupils had their own bedroom.Whereas fourteen pupils shared with one other person and one person shared with three brothers.On a week day the average time of getting up was 7.00am.On a weekend it was 9.00am - 9.30am.Thirty nine pupils that we interviewed said they ate cereals for breakfast, seventeen said that they ate toast, six had coffee and the rest ate nothing.On Saturday mornings most pupils go to town, others watch television.All the rest play football or games.Most pupils call for their friends.The most popular pastimes are sport and television which most of them do with their families.We also concluded that dogs and cats are the most popular family pets.
